name: 陳偉堯
objective: 本課程作為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授電腦指令、程式概念及Fortran高階程式語言，內容包括電腦歷史、語言發展、電腦運作概念、整數和實數的二進位表達方法、指定敘述、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 1: 校園網路新生指南
Week 2: Computing history
Week 3: Computer architecture and Linux commands
Week 4: using gedit and vi (first program)
Week 5: integer and real numbers
Week 6: statements and equations
Week 7: branch statements
Week 8: if and select 
Week 9: Midterm 期中考
Week 10: while loop 
Week 11: for loop
Week 12: write and read
Week 13: formatting characters
Week 14: sorting
Week 15: Array and procedures
Week 16: Procedures
Week 17: linear regression
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
平時成績40%
期中考30%
期末考30%
materials: Chapman, S. J. (2004). Fortran 95/2003 for Scientists & Engineers, Third edition, McGraw Hill, 1008 pages.
